message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think this is a reasonable offer considering the inflation rates.
I believe a 65-35 split is more fair, considering the inflation rates. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm also aware of the time pressure.
I took into account your counteroffer, but I think a 57-43 split is more reasonable, given the increasing inflation impact on both of us. Let's settle on this before it's too late.
I'm willing to go back to the 60-40 split from the first round.  We need to be realistic about the time pressure and the growing inflation. Let's find common ground and finish this.
